sentences.en: a designer who experiments with different colours and textures
sentences.cn: 尝试不同色彩和材质的设计师

sentences.en: Aloe Vera is used in moisturisers to give them a wonderfully silky texture.
sentences.cn: 芦荟用于润肤霜中，使之具有美妙的丝般润滑感。

sentences.en: Both the texture and condition of your hair should improve.
sentences.cn: 你头发的发质与健康状况都应改善。

sentences.en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentences.cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

sentences.en: Earthworms consume large amounts of soil, and produce a rich humus, perfect in texture.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓吃下大量土壤，排出肥力丰富、物理结构理想的腐殖质。

sentences.en: Foundation make-up evens out your skin tone and texture.
sentences.cn: 底妆让你的肤色和肤质均匀。

sentences.en: He meditated resentfully on the physical texture of life.
sentences.cn: 他满心忿忿不平,左思右想着生活的物质方面.

sentences.en: Her skin is pale, the texture of fine wax.
sentences.cn: 她肤色苍白，肤质细腻如蜡。

sentences.en: It is the pressure which releases the coffee oils; these emulsify and give the coffee its rich, velvety texture.
sentences.cn: 压力将咖啡的油脂挤出，这些油脂经乳化带给咖啡一种浓郁、柔滑的口感。

sentences.en: Matured over 18 months, this cheese has an open, crumbly texture with a strong flavour.
sentences.cn: 这种奶酪18个月后发酵成熟，气孔多，组织松脆，味道浓郁。

sentences.en: The mask is left on for about 15 minutes while it sets to a rubbery texture.
sentences.cn: 面膜敷上后等约15分钟，待其变成橡胶状质地。

sentences.en: the smooth texture of silk
sentences.cn: 丝绸的光滑质感

sentences.en: the soft texture of velvet
sentences.cn: 天鹅绒柔软的质地

sentences.en: This cheese has a crumbly texture with a strong flavour.
sentences.cn: 这种奶酪口感松脆，味道浓郁。

sentences.en: This cheese has an open, crumbly texture with a strong flavour.
sentences.cn: 这种奶酪多孔松脆，风味浓郁。

sentences.en: This cloth has a silky texture.
sentences.cn: 这种布具有丝的质地。

sentences.en: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
sentences.cn: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

sentences.en: We could feel the smooth texture of silk.
sentences.cn: 我们能感觉出丝绸的光滑质地.

sentences.en: What is the texture of your experience?
sentences.cn: 这次经历的实质是什么？

sentences.en: Young haricot beans have a tender texture and a delicate, subtle flavour.
sentences.cn: 嫩菜豆口感细腻，味道清香、淡雅。

words.tran_cn: 有织纹的；手摸时有感觉的；具有特定结构的；特征显著的
使具有某种结构（texture的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 细密结构；微观组织，微细组织
纤维素；细腻组织，均匀组织
土壤质地；土壤结构；土攘组织；土壤粗密度
表面纹理；表面织构；表面构造
纹理映射；纹理贴图；材质贴图；贴图坐标

trans.tran_en: the way a surface or material feels when you touch it, especially how smooth or rough it is
